programme.title: Keluarga Instafamous Ep06

programme.title: Inmate #1: the Rise of Danny Trejo
programme.desc: This feature documentary reveals the extraordinary life journey of Hollywood's most unlikely hero, Danny Trejo.

programme.title: Once
programme.desc: A modern-day musical about a busker and an immigrant and their eventful week in Dublin as they write rehearse and record songs that tell their love story.

programme.title: Like Crazy
programme.desc: A British college student falls for an American student but finds out that they have to be separated.

programme.title: Love Song
programme.desc: A struggling country singer meets a Nashville songwriter in need of inspiration. Teaming up to write a song, their work gets complicated but results in both a hit song...and true love.

programme.title: Imagine That
programme.desc: When a successful executive suffers a crisis of confidence and his career is at stake, he finds the solution to his problems in his daughter's imaginary world.

programme.title: Run (2020)
programme.desc: Diane has raised her daughter in total isolation, controlling every move she's made since birth, and there are secrets that Chloe's only beginning to grasp.

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: The Academy Award-winning Rocky franchise sees former heavyweight champion Rocky Balboa steps out of retirement and back into the ring again.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: Desperate townspeople hire seven mercenaries to battle a greedy industrialist and his ruthless henchmen in the Old West.

programme.title: A Series of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: Jim Carrey, Meryl Streep and Jude Law star in this film of the young Baudelaire orphans who are taken in by odd relatives after their parents' death.

programme.title: Me Before You
programme.desc: A young countryside woman and an affluent banker paralyzed in a tragic accident couldn't have less in common, but in this heartbreakingly romance, they gain understanding, and ultimately love.

programme.title: Midway
programme.desc: Based on true events in the Battle of Midway, the film tells story of the leaders and soldiers who used their instincts, fortitude, and bravery to overcome the odds during World War II.

programme.title: Joker
programme.desc: An original, independent story that centers on the famous arch-nemesis of Batman - it explores Arthur Fleck and his journey from societal outcast and failed comedian to cackling criminal mastermind.

programme.title: Six Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: Just before World War II, a teacher disappears in an English boarding school for the daughters of top Nazi officials. British agent Miller is sent to find out what happened, much to his own peril.

programme.desc: A young buyer in Philly is hoping to buy an old row house, but her mom wants her in a high rise.

programme.desc: A couple's historic home is full of character, but between the boxy living areas and four people sharing one bathroom, the layout falls short for a modern family.
